alert.note: Alert for Ballard; Carlisle; Fulton; Hickman (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued December 18 at 2:21AM EST until December 18 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Rapid changes in visibility, falling to less than one quarter of a mile in freezing fog. * WHERE...Portions of southern Illinois, western Kentucky and southeast Missouri. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Low visibility and slick roadways, especially bridges and overpasses such as large river crossings. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Observations show rapid changes in visibility with dense fog forming in riverbeds and low lying areas. Bridges over these areas would also be more likely to be slick with temperatures just below freezing.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for frost on bridge decks causing slippery roads.
